info.description:
The API doc is targeting for Zadig developers rather than Zadig users.
The majority of these APIs are not designed for public use, there is no guarantee on version compatibility.
Please reach out to contact@koderover.com before you decide to depend on these APIs directly.
info.title: Zadig aslan service REST APIs

get.description: Get global variable from environment, current only used for k8s project

parameters.description: is force to create service template
parameters.name: force

variable_yaml.description: VariableYaml added since 1.18, used for helm production environments

service_variable_kvs.description: New since 1.18.0, stores the variable kvs of k8s services

service_vars.description: DEPRECATED, New since 1.16.0, stores keys in variables which can be set in env

variable_yaml.description: New since 1.16.0, stores the variable yaml of k8s services

workload_type.description: WorkloadType is set in host projects

origin_job_name.description: save the origin quoted job name

deploy_strategy.description: New since 1.16.0, used to determine if the service will be installed
New since 1.16.0, used to determine if the service will be installed

namespace.description: records the actual namespace of repo, used to generate correct project name

override_values.description: used for helm services, json-encoded string of kv value

override_yaml.description:
OverrideYaml will be used in both helm and k8s projects
In k8s this is variable_yaml
